Uses of Package
com.noelios.restlet

  • Packages that use com.noelios.restlet 
    Package Description
    com.noelios.restlet
    Core classes of the implementation.
    com.noelios.restlet.application
    Implementation of Applications.
    com.noelios.restlet.component
    Implementation of Components.
    com.noelios.restlet.http
    Implementation of HTTP Connectors.
    com.noelios.restlet.local
    Implementation of local Clients.
  • Classes in com.noelios.restlet used by com.noelios.restlet 
    Class and Description
    ClientHelper
    Client connector helper.
    ConnectorHelper
    Base connector helper.
    Engine
    Restlet factory supported by the engine.
    ServerHelper
    Server connector helper.
  • Classes in com.noelios.restlet used by com.noelios.restlet.application 
    Class and Description
    ChainHelper
    Chain helper serving as base class for Application and Component helpers.
    StatusFilter
    Filter associating a response entity based on the status.
  • Classes in com.noelios.restlet used by com.noelios.restlet.component 
    Class and Description
    ChainHelper
    Chain helper serving as base class for Application and Component helpers.
    StatusFilter
    Filter associating a response entity based on the status.
    TemplateDispatcher
    Base call dispatcher capable of resolving target resource URI templates.
  • Classes in com.noelios.restlet used by com.noelios.restlet.http 
    Class and Description
    ClientHelper
    Client connector helper.
    ConnectorHelper
    Base connector helper.
    ServerHelper
    Server connector helper.
  • Classes in com.noelios.restlet used by com.noelios.restlet.local

    Client connector helper.
    ConnectorHelper
    Base connector helper.
